original_text: From there it went through the valley of Hinnom to the south side of a hill beside the Jebusite city of Jerusalem. Judah's border then continued to the top of the hill on the west side of the Hinnom valley. This was at the north end of the valley of the Rephaites.
korean_text: 또 힌놈의 아들의 골짜기로 올라가서 여부스 곧 예루살렘 남쪽 어깨에 이르며 또 힌놈의 골짜기 앞 서쪽에 있는 산 꼭대기로 올라가나니 이곳은 르바임 골짜기 북쪽 끝이며

sentences.original_text: From there it went through the valley of Hinnom
to the south side of a hill
beside the Jebusite city of Jerusalem
to the top of the hill
on the west side of the Hinnom valley
This was at the north end
of the valley of the Rephaites
